description:
'''Florent Belemgnegré''', better known by his stage name '''Floby''', is a [[Burkina Faso|Burkinabé]] singer and musician. He sings in the [[French language|French]] and [[Mossi language|Mòoré]] languages. His music uses African sounds such as the [[Kora (instrument)|kora]] and [[djembe]] but also rap and electric guitar.

He is also known by the nicknames ''le King Zodanga'', ''le Papa des Orphelins'' and ''le Kirikou d’Afrique''.
